Content.Text:
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Are you here to see Neil
too?
<PAGE>
I was walking my dog and dropped in to
see him on my route.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Neil's inside the house. I'm going home
to pick up something I forgot. See you
later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, you're a cutie, aren't you!
<PAGE>
Rod's just gone to get something he
forgot. Don't worry, we'll wait for him
to come back together.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, wait! Hold on!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
H-Hey, how long have you been there for?
You s-surprised me!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Fess up, how long have you been
standing there? You didn't see...
see any of that, did you?
I just got here
I saw you playing with the dog

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good. Forget I said anything.
<PAGE>
Rod left me here with his dog. Not for
too long, just a little while.
<PAGE>
I've got a lot of other things to do,
though! I don't have time for this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In fact, I was just about to go and drop
his dog off back at Rod's house. Do you
want to come along?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go then. Come on, doggy. We're not
leaving you behind.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There it is! Right, I'd better get back
to Neil's place.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey? What are you doing here? I was just
about to come back over.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm bringing your dog back. A dog needs
a master, after all! I can't do you
favors all day long!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What're you talking about? You're the
one who said you'd look after my dog
while I came back to get this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Enough double talk! I've no idea what
you're talking about!
<PAGE>
Here's your dog back. I'm going home!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
See you later, both of you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What's up with Neil?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You saw him playing with my dog? I guess
he was embarrassed at getting seen.
<PAGE>
He must know you saw him and came here
to hide his embarrassment.
<PAGE>
He's got a bit of a sharp tongue so it
can be hard to tell, but he's actually
a really kind guy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad that he's got someone else who
understands him now, anyway.
<PAGE>
I guess this sounds a little odd coming
from me, but I hope you'll be a good
friend to Neil.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
W-What are you talking about? I don't
know what you think you saw, but you
didn't!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You're just another noisy busy-body!
It's not like I was doing anything
wrong!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm back. Wow, things are a bit heavy in
here! What's going on?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's nothing. Take your dog and get out
of here.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Neil, is something wrong? What happened?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Nothing! Get out of here, go on!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey... can you tell me what that was all
about?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I see. Neil obviously didn't want to be
seen doing stuff like that.
<PAGE>
He's very shy, though you probably
wouldn't think so to look at him. You
should have pretended not to see.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I guess we'll just have to give him some
space for a while.
